mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (cart_id, member_id, pd_id, select_option, stock) VALUES (seq_cart_id.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{pdId}, #{selectOption}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT p.pd_id, p.pd_name, b.brand_name, pi.pd_image_url, po.pd_option_name AS select_option, COUNT(*) AS stock , ROUND(p.pd_price * ( 1 - p.pd_discount_rate / 100 ), -1) AS pd_price FROM product p JOIN brand b ON p.brand_id = b.brand_id JOIN product_image i ON p.pd_id = i.pd_id JOIN large_ctgr lc ON p.large_ctgr_id = lc.large_ctgr_id JOIN product_option po ON lc.large_ctgr_id = po.large_ctgr_id JOIN product_image pi ON p.pd_id = pi.pd_id WHERE p.pd_id = #{pdId} AND po.pd_option_id = #{pdOptionId } GROUP BY p.pd_id, p.pd_name, p.pd_price, b.brand_name, pi.pd_image_url, po.pd_option_name, p.pd_discount_rate
